Description 
Reliable translations which require professional 
Personal Translator 14 Professional is the essential tool to make translations quickly and convincingly. 88 of 100 major German companies have already implemented successful Personal Translator and managed to save time and money. 



Benefits at a glance 

* Professional: SmartTranslation ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â‚¬Å¾Ã‚Â¢ smart technology to achieve outstanding quality translations. 
* Now: a large dictionary with more than 3.8 million entries. 
* Efficient: contrasting time savings over 40%. 
* Security: the translation process is carried out on the PC and the Internet. 
* For the sake of economy: one price for 7 languages. 


11 good reasons to choose Personal Translator 14 Professional 

High quality translation: 
Thanks to SmartAnalyse is also able to correctly translate phrases and idioms chained complicated. 
Tolerate errors: 
Through the automatic correction of typographical errors, the quality of translation is significantly higher. 
Global Communications: 
Personal Translator 14 Professional includes 7 language pairs: 
German English 
French German 
EnglishFrench 
English Italian 
English Portuguese (BR) 
English Spanish 
English Chinese 
Intelligent contextual analysis: 
Now you can even translate correctly polysemic words, for example, mono (animal or clothing) or skirt (clothing or bottom of a hill). 
Dictionaries with numerous entries: 
The dictionaries include 3.8 million entries with very illustrative example sentences. 
Individual setting: 
Personal Translator Professional is capable of learning through its translation memory. The later edition favors future translations. 
Business EspaÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â±ol: 
For business correspondence in English are available 25,000 additional text elements. 
Synthesis of high-quality voice: 
The reader integrated innovative feature sounds surprisingly natural and helps to correct errors in reading or in case of doubt about the pronunciation. 
High data security: 
Compared with the translations online, with local program Personal Translator will not be exposed to any risk related to security. 
Significant time savings: 
A study by the Fraunhofer Institute demonstrates that the use of Personal Translator can save 40% time. 
Certified for Windows 7: 
Through the Windows 7 certificate guaranteeing the standards that make the management of Personal Translator is particularly convenient and simple. Compatible with 32 and 64 bits. 


System Requirements 

* Windows XP (SP2), Windows Vista or Windows 7 
* Internet Explorer (version 6.0 or later) 
* 1 GHz Pentium processor with 512 MB free RAM 
* 1 GB free hard disk space 
* Internet connection for product activation 
* MS Office Integration: Microsoft Office 2002 (XP), 2003 or 2007 
* Speech Synthesis: Sound card
